instructions: Tap Settings > More . Tap Cellular networks > IMS Settings > Voice over LTE On/ Off.
Tap Settings > More . Tap Cellular networks > Enhanced 4G LTE Mode On/ Off .
Tap Settings > Call . Tap More . Check or uncheck Voice over LTE .
Tap Settings > Call . Select VoLTE On/ Off .
Tap Settings > Call . Tap Voice over LTE settings . Select Use VoLTE when available or Do not use VoLTE .
Tap Phone > Keypad tab . Tap More options > Call settings . Select VoLTE settings On/ Off.
Tap Phone > Keypad tab . Tap More options > Settings . Tap Call > Voice over LTE settings . Tap Use VoLTE when available or Do not use VoLTE .
From any Home screen, tap Phone . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Settings . Tap Voice over LTE settings . Select one of the following: Turn on : Use VoLTE when available Turn off : Do not use VoLTE
Tap Settings > Call settings . Check or uncheck Enable VoLTE.
